title: High Elf
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | This is a tall and powerful Elven species who advance in levels slowly, requiring half again as much experience as Humans. They have good intelligence and dexterity, but suffer in strength. Compared with Humans, they have fewer HP but more magic. Among all races, they are best with blades and bows. They are not very good with necromancy or with earth or poison magic, but are highly skilled with most other forms of magic, especially Air and Charms. |

## Contents

- [1 Innate Abilities](#Innate_Abilities)
- [2 Preferred Backgrounds](#Preferred_Backgrounds)
- [3 Level Bonuses](#Level_Bonuses)
- [4 Starting Equipment and Skills](#Starting_Equipment_and_Skills)
- [5 Difficulty of Play](#Difficulty_of_Play)
- [6 Skill aptitudes](#Skill_aptitudes)
- [7 History](#History)

## Innate Abilities

High Elves have a base [Strength](/Strength "Strength") of 7, [Intelligence](/Intelligence "Intelligence") of 11 and [Dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity") of 10 (before Background modifiers) and have one extra base [magic point](/Magic_points "Magic points").

## Preferred Backgrounds

- **Warriors:** [Hunter](/Hunter "Hunter")
- **Warrior-mages:** [Skald](/Skald "Skald")
- **Mages:** [Wizard](/Wizard "Wizard"), [Conjurer](/Conjurer "Conjurer"), [Fire Elementalist](/Fire_Elementalist "Fire Elementalist"), [Ice Elementalist](/Ice_Elementalist "Ice Elementalist"), [Air Elementalist](/Air_Elementalist "Air Elementalist")

## Level Bonuses

- +1 [intelligence](/Intelligence "Intelligence") or [dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity") (equal chance) every 3rd level.
- 10% less [hit points](/Hit_points "Hit points") than average.
- +4 [magic resistance](/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") per level.

## Starting Equipment and Skills

High Elves receive all the skills and equipment listed for their background.

## Difficulty of Play

|                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Simple](/Category:Easy_species "Category:Easy species") • **[Intermediate](/Category:Moderate_species "Category:Moderate species")** • [Advanced](/Category:Hard_species "Category:Hard species") |

High Elves are a rather easy species to play, because of good overall aptitudes and a large mana pool; however, they have slightly lower HP (-10%) than normal and level somewhat slowly.

## Skill aptitudes

Values are from the most recent version that had both the species and the skill:

|                [Skill](/Skill "Skill")               | [Aptitude](/Aptitude "Aptitude") |             [Skill](/Skill "Skill")             | [Aptitude](/Aptitude "Aptitude") | [Skill](/Skill "Skill")                            | [Aptitude](/Aptitude "Aptitude") |
| :--------------------------------------------------: | :------------------------------: | :---------------------------------------------: | -------------------------------: | -------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------: |
|                     ***Attack***                     |                                  |               ***Miscellaneous***               |                                  | ***Magic***                                        |                                  |
|           [Fighting](/Fighting "Fighting")           |                 0                |            [Armour](/Armour "Armour")           |                               -1 | [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting")       |                                1 |
|     [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")     |                 2                |          [Dodging](/Dodging "Dodging")          |                                1 | [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")       |                                1 |
|       [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")      |                 2                | [Stealth](/Stealth_\(skill\) "Stealth (skill)") |                                2 | [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes")                            |                                0 |
| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") |                -2                | [Shields](/Shields_\(skill\) "Shields (skill)") |                               -1 | [Charms](/Charms "Charms")                         |                                2 |
|                 [Axes](/Axes "Axes")                 |                -2                |         [Stabbing](/Stabbing "Stabbing")        |                               -1 | [Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings")             |                               -1 |
|           [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")           |                -2                |             [Traps](/Traps "Traps")             |                                0 | [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")             |                               -2 |
|       [Staves](/Magical_staff "Magical staff")       |                 0                |                                                 |                                  | [Translocations](/Translocations "Translocations") |                                1 |
|  [Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat")  |                -2                |    [Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations")    |                                1 | [Transmutations](/Transmutations "Transmutations") |                                1 |
|                                                      |                                  |      [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations")     |                                0 |                                                    |                                  |
|           [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")           |                 0                | [Shapeshifting](/Shapeshifting "Shapeshifting") |                              N/A | [Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic")             |                                0 |
|  [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")  |                N/A               |                                                 |                                  | [Ice Magic](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic")                |                                0 |
|              [Slings](/Slings "Slings")              |                -2                |      [Experience](/Experience "Experience")     |                               -1 | [Air Magic](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")                |                                2 |
|                 [Bows](/Bows "Bows")                 |                 3                |                                                 |                                  | [Earth Magic](/Earth_Magic "Earth Magic")          |                               -2 |
|          [Crossbows](/Crossbows "Crossbows")         |                 0                |                                                 |                                  | [Poison Magic](/Poison_Magic "Poison Magic")       |                               -2 |
|                                                      |                                  |                                                 |                                  | [Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy")                      |                              N/A |

## History

- High Elves were removed in [0.20](/0.20 "0.20").
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), racial equipment existed. High elves were able to use [elven](/Racial_equipment#Elven "Racial equipment") equipment more effectively than standard gear.

| [Species](/Species "Species") |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Simple                        | [Mountain Dwarf](/Mountain_Dwarf "Mountain Dwarf") • [Minotaur](/Minotaur "Minotaur") • [Merfolk](/Merfolk "Merfolk") • [Gargoyle](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle") • [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") • [Troll](/Troll "Troll") • [Deep Elf](/Deep_Elf "Deep Elf") • [Armataur](/Armataur "Armataur") • [Gnoll](/Gnoll "Gnoll") |
| Intermediate                  | [Human](/Human "Human") • [Kobold](/Kobold "Kobold") • [Demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn") • [Djinni](/Djinni "Djinni") • [Spriggan](/Spriggan "Spriggan") • [Ghoul](/Ghoul "Ghoul") • [Tengu](/Tengu "Tengu") • [Oni](/Oni "Oni") • [Barachi](/Barachi "Barachi")                                                    |
| Advanced                      | [Coglin](/Coglin "Coglin") • [Vine Stalker](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker") • [Vampire](/Vampire "Vampire") • [Demigod](/Demigod "Demigod") • [Formicid](/Formicid "Formicid") • [Naga](/Naga "Naga") • [Octopode](/Octopode "Octopode") • [Felid](/Felid "Felid") • [Mummy](/Mummy "Mummy")                               |
html:
High Elf

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
This is a tall and powerful Elven species who advance in levels slowly, requiring half again as much experience as Humans. They have good intelligence and dexterity, but suffer in strength. Compared with Humans, they have fewer HP but more magic. Among all races, they are best with blades and bows. They are not very good with necromancy or with earth or poison magic, but are highly skilled with most other forms of magic, especially Air and Charms.

Contents

  • 1 Innate Abilities
  • 2 Preferred Backgrounds
  • 3 Level Bonuses
  • 4 Starting Equipment and Skills
  • 5 Difficulty of Play
  • 6 Skill aptitudes
  • 7 History

Innate Abilities

High Elves have a base Strength of 7, Intelligence of 11 and Dexterity of 10 (before Background modifiers) and have one extra base magic point.

Preferred Backgrounds

  • Warriors: Hunter
  • Warrior-mages: Skald
  • Mages: Wizard, Conjurer, Fire Elementalist, Ice Elementalist, Air Elementalist

Level Bonuses

  • +1 intelligence or dexterity (equal chance) every 3rd level.
  • 10% less hit points than average.
  • +4 magic resistance per level.

Starting Equipment and Skills

High Elves receive all the skills and equipment listed for their background.

Difficulty of Play

Simple • Intermediate • Advanced

High Elves are a rather easy species to play, because of good overall aptitudes and a large mana pool; however, they have slightly lower HP (-10%) than normal and level somewhat slowly.

Skill aptitudes

Values are from the most recent version that had both the species and the skill:

Skill Aptitude Skill Aptitude Skill Aptitude
Attack Miscellaneous Magic
Fighting 0 Armour -1 Spellcasting 1
Short Blades 2 Dodging 1 Conjurations 1
Long Blades 2 Stealth 2 Hexes 0
Maces & Flails -2 Shields -1 Charms 2
Axes -2 Stabbing -1 Summonings -1
Polearms -2 Traps 0 Necromancy -2
Staves 0 Translocations 1
Unarmed Combat -2 Invocations 1 Transmutations 1
Evocations 0
Throwing 0 Shapeshifting N/A Fire Magic 0
Ranged Weapons N/A Ice Magic 0
Slings -2 Experience -1 Air Magic 2
Bows 3 Earth Magic -2
Crossbows 0 Poison Magic -2
Alchemy N/A

History

  • High Elves were removed in 0.20.
  • Prior to 0.14, racial equipment existed. High elves were able to use elven equipment more effectively than standard gear.
Species
Simple Mountain Dwarf • Minotaur • Merfolk • Gargoyle • Draconian • Troll • Deep Elf • Armataur • Gnoll
Intermediate Human • Kobold • Demonspawn • Djinni • Spriggan • Ghoul • Tengu • Oni • Barachi
Advanced Coglin • Vine Stalker • Vampire • Demigod • Formicid • Naga • Octopode • Felid • Mummy

High Elves have a base [[Strength]] of 7, [[Intelligence]] of 11 and [[Dexterity]] of 10 (before Background modifiers) and have one extra base [[magic points|magic point]].

==Preferred Backgrounds==
*'''Warriors:''' [[Hunter]]

*+1 [[intelligence]] or [[dexterity]] (equal chance) every 3rd level.
*10% less [[hit points]] than average.
*+4 [[magic resistance]] per level.

High Elves receive all the skills and equipment listed for their background.

==Difficulty of Play==

{{Moderate}}

High Elves are a rather easy species to play, because of good overall aptitudes and a large mana pool; however, they have slightly lower HP (-10%) than normal and level somewhat slowly.
